text: Ūst, ki şumoro az xok va sipas [taji marohili muxtalif] az nutfa va on goh xuni ʙasta [çanini iʙtidoī] ofarid, sipas şumoro [ʙa surati] kūdake [ʙa dunjo] meovarad va imkon medihad, to ʙa haddi ruşd [va kamoli neru] ʙirased. Sipas [solho zindagī mekuned, to] solxūrda meşaved. Barxe az şumo ducori margi zudras xohand şud va [ʙa gurūhe digar imkon medihad], to ʙa açali muajjan ʙirased, ʙoşad, ki ʙiandeşed
